title: Rudraksh
occurrences: the secret of his empire and his rudraksh
arrived here in search of the truth of that mighty rudraksh
Little did they know that Ravana's rudraksh had chosen its first slave
that could lead Bhuria to the hidden rudraksh
That rudraksh belongs to me
This rudraksh... it's beautiful
From here begins the strange story of Bhuria and Ravana's rudraksh
The rudraksh's sole aim:
Bhuria was deep in meditation to the rudraksh
I have spent 14 years in exile with this rudraksh
I haven't been able to acquire all the powers of the rudraksh
What is the rudraksh?
Rudraksh which means the beads of Rudra (Lord Shiva)
You don't even touch a one-dimensioned rudraksh
and got from Him a rudraksh
Ravana placed the essence of his philosophy in the rudraksh...
Lord Rama vanquished Ravana. So what happened of the rudraksh?
It was believed that the rudraksh was razed to ashes in Lanka
Ravana's rudraksh was razed to ashes thousands of years ago. Correct?
So how can a mantra contained in the rudraksh...
